Item.name: ORCA Deep Dive Helmet MK1
Item.description: An advanced diving helmet meant to complement the Mk2 Horizons suit. It features many of the same protective qualities and comes with a built in light.

Item.name: ORCA Deep Dive Helmet MK2 «Status»
Item.description: A direct upgrade to its predecessor, it features better battery life and an automatic hull oxygen system to conserve resources. On top of this, it features a health scanner HUD.

Item.name: ORCA Deep Dive Helmet MK3 «Thermal»
Item.description: The bleeding edge of helmet technology. The best balance of protection and utility on the market, this helmet features thermal goggles, a headlamp, a rebreather, and further enhanced battery life.

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon rrR-#1 Helmet
Item.description: An upgraded diving helmet designed to complement the rrR-#2 suit. Like its Horizons counterpart, it matches its respective suit's qualities, having greater agility and environmental protection than the Horizons series.

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon rrR-#2 Helmet «Status»
Item.description: An improved rrR-series helmet. While it lacks the health status HUD of the Horizons mk2 helmet, it boasts greater protection in turn.

Item.name: ORCA Phaethon rrR-#3 Helmet «Thermal»
Item.description: The supposed pinnacle of the rrR-series helms. Still, one has to wonder if there's a better helmet out there somewhere.
